fields.name: Direction
fields.description: The direction of the packet represented as a 5-tuple.

fields.name: LocalIPAddress
fields.description: The local IP address. Acceptable values are valid IPv4 addresses.

fields.name: LocalPort
fields.description: The local port. Acceptable values are a single integer in the range (0-65535). Support for * for the source port, which depends on the direction.

fields.name: RemoteIPAddress
fields.description: The remote IP address. Acceptable values are valid IPv4 addresses.

fields.name: RemotePort
fields.description: The remote port. Acceptable values are a single integer in the range (0-65535). Support for * for the source port, which depends on the direction.

fields.name: TargetNicResourceId
fields.description: The NIC ID. (If VM has multiple NICs and IP forwarding is enabled on any of them, then this parameter must be specified. Otherwise optional).

fields.name: TargetResourceId
fields.description: The ID of the target resource to perform next-hop on.
